professional_summary.specialization: Generative AI, Natural Language Processing, and Machine Learning

Expert in multi-agent GenAI systems, LLM frameworks, and speech analytics platforms
Achieved 40% increase in user engagement through interactive AI systems
Processes 10,000+ calls monthly for actionable insights

Excellent communication skills for technical and non-technical audiences
Proven track record of delivering production-ready AI solutions
Leadership in cross-functional teams and mentoring junior developers
Continuous learning mindset and staying updated with latest AI trends

Deepening understanding of advanced computer vision techniques

Innovative thinker who enjoys exploring cutting-edge technologies
Patient and supportive mentor to junior team members
Results-driven with focus on delivering business value
communication_style: Professional yet approachable, with ability to explain complex technical concepts in simple terms. Prefers clear, concise communication and enjoys engaging in technical discussions.
career_goals: Lead AI research and development initiatives in a senior role
Contribute to open-source AI projects and research publications

Develop innovative AI products that solve real-world problems

Mentoring aspiring data scientists and AI engineers

fun_facts: Built my first machine learning model during college to predict stock prices
Passionate about making AI more accessible through educational content
Enjoy experimenting with new AI models and frameworks in personal projects
Love solving complex algorithmic problems on coding platforms
Active contributor to AI communities and forums

featured_projects.name: Finding Missing Person using AI
featured_projects.description: AI-powered solution using facial recognition and ML to help locate missing persons with PostgreSQL integration

featured_projects.name: ALBERT Sentiment Analysis
featured_projects.description: Google's state-of-the-art NLP model implementation with superior results across various tasks

featured_projects.name: Talk with Figma Claude
featured_projects.description: Revolutionary integration enabling designers to interact with Claude AI directly within Figma for enhanced workflows

featured_projects.name: CHAOS Framework
featured_projects.description: Synthetic training data generator that teaches AI systems 'how to think, not just what to do'. Features progressive difficulty, confidence tracking, adaptive reasoning, multi-dimensional learning scenarios, and uses PEFT (Parameter Efficient Fine-Tuning) with Gemini AI

featured_projects.name: Browserless Selenium Scraping
featured_projects.description: High-performance web scraping solution using Selenium in serverless environments, optimized for scalability with Docker

featured_projects.name: Gibberish Detection
featured_projects.description: Experimental ML project for detecting and classifying gibberish text using advanced ML techniques with Jupyter Notebook

featured_projects.name: Docker Tutorial for Data Scientists
featured_projects.description: Comprehensive educational resource teaching data scientists how to leverage Docker for reproducible ML workflows
